self.title: CDISC Questionnaire PODCI Adolescent Parent-Reported Version Test Name Terminology

definition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Parent-Reported Version test name.
name: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Parent-Reported Version Questionnaire Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire PODCI Adolescent Parent-Reported Version Test Name Terminology
synonyms: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Parent-Reported Version Questionnaire Test Name

terms.definition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Parent-Reported - During the last week, how happy has your child been with: His/her ability to do the same things his/her friends do?
terms.preferredTerm: PODCI Adolescent Parent-Reported Version - Ability Do Same Things Friends Do
terms.submissionValue: PODCI2-Ability Do Same Things Friends Do
synonyms: PODCI2-Ability Do Same Things Friends Do

terms.definition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Parent-Reported - As a result of my child's treatment, I expect my child: To be able to do activities at home.
terms.preferredTerm: PODCI Adolescent Parent-Reported Version - Able to Do Activities at Home
terms.submissionValue: PODCI2-Able to Do Activities at Home
synonyms: PODCI2-Able to Do Activities at Home

terms.definition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Parent-Reported - As a result of my child's treatment, I expect my child: To be able to do more at school.

terms.submissionValue: PODCI2-Able to Do More at School

terms.definition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Parent-Reported - As a result of my child's treatment, I expect my child: To be able to do more play or recreational activities.

terms.definition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Parent-Reported - As a result of my child's treatment, I expect my child: To be able to do more sports.
terms.preferredTerm: PODCI Adolescent Parent-Reported Version - Able to Do More Sports

terms.definition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Parent-Reported - During the last week, has it been easy or hard for your child to: Bend over from a standing position and pick up something off the floor?

terms.definition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Parent-Reported - During the last week, has it been easy or hard for your child to: Climb one flight of stairs?

terms.preferredTerm: PODCI Adolescent Parent-Reported Version - Comb His or Her Hair

terms.preferredTerm: PODCI Adolescent Parent-Reported Version - Competitive Sports Limited by: Dislike

terms.definition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Parent-Reported - If you answered "no" to Question 52 above, was your child's activity limited by: Fear the other kids won't like him/her?
terms.preferredTerm: PODCI Adolescent Parent-Reported Version - Competitive Sports Limited by: Fear

terms.definition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Parent-Reported - If you answered "no" to Question 52 above, was your child's activity limited by: General health?
terms.preferredTerm: PODCI Adolescent Parent-Reported Version - Competitive Sports Limited by: Health

terms.definition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Parent-Reported - If you answered "no" to Question 52 above, was your child's activity limited by: Doctor or parent instructions?
terms.preferredTerm: PODCI Adolescent Parent-Reported Version - Competitive Sports Limited by: Instructions

terms.definition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Parent-Reported - If you answered "no" to Question 52 above, was your child's activity limited by: Pain?
terms.preferredTerm: PODCI Adolescent Parent-Reported Version - Competitive Sports Limited by: Pain

terms.preferredTerm: PODCI Adolescent Parent-Reported Version - Competitive Sports Limited by: Season

terms.definition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Parent-Reported - Can your child participate in competitive level sports with other children the same age (For example: hockey, basketball, soccer, football, baseball, swimming, running [track or cross country], gymnastics, or dance)?
terms.preferredTerm: PODCI Adolescent Parent-Reported Version - Participate in Competitive Sports

terms.definition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Adolescent Parent-Reported - Can your child participate in pickup games or sports with other children the same age (For example: tag, dodge ball, basketball, softball, soccer, catch, jump rope, touch football, hop scotch)?
terms.preferredTerm: PODCI Adolescent Parent-Reported Version - Participate in Pickup Games
